scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev:ai-services" "npm run dev:cloud-integrations" "npm run dev:data-services"
scripts.build: npm run build:ai-services && npm run build:cloud-integrations && npm run build:data-services
scripts.lint: npm run lint:ai-services && npm run lint:cloud-integrations && npm run lint:data-services
scripts.test: npm run test:ai-services && npm run test:cloud-integrations && npm run test:data-services
scripts.clean: find . -name 'dist' -type d -exec rm -rf {} + && find . -name 'node_modules' -type d -exec rm -rf {} +
scripts.install:all: npm run install:ai-services && npm run install:cloud-integrations && npm run install:data-services
scripts.start: concurrently "npm run start:ai-services" "npm run start:cloud-integrations" "npm run start:data-services"
